summary: Restarted Laravel server and cleared all caches (optimize:clear, view:clear, config:clear, cache:clear). Error persists - Livewire MultipleRootElementsDetectedException still occurring. File structure appears correct with single root div element. May need to investigate component includes or use fragment wrapper.
current_status: Server restarted and caches cleared. Livewire error still present. Need to investigate further - possibly component includes or whitespace issues.
